p: The 5 th, 50 th (median), and 95 th percentiles for established and successful partnerships are, respectively, 3.3 x 10 4, 1.8 x 10 5, and 1.7 x 10 6 km 2. If expressed in terms of circular areas, to match our moving window analysis, the radii would be 102, 242, and 729 km. These correspond closely to our a priori chosen radii of 81, 243, and 729 km.
